author: tersec
content: Can use current `testing` for now; supports `mekong` as custom network. Might or might not be an actual release for this

author: potuz
content: Suggestion for the next interop: make it 9 days. The first 6 days the EL teams go, the last 6 days the CL teams go. Cross chain topics are discussed the three days in the middle

author: potuz
content: Should roughly have the same cost as a full 6 days interop

author: potuz
content: Can be scaled to 6 days total with 2 of intersection
